TrackMania fact #390 speedslides happen because at >390 speed the tires reach temperatures that turn the material into a supersolid which unifies the properties of superfluids and rigid bodies. That means with the right angle you get normal grip while simultaneuosly having close to zero rolling resistance. The recipe for the tyre material is Nadeo's most valuable asset.
